scripts.migrate:test: CI=true wrangler d1 migrations apply DB --env dev --local --persist-to .wrangler/state/unit-test
scripts.migrate:local: wrangler d1 migrations apply DB --env dev --local
scripts.migrate:seed-local: wrangler d1 execute DB --env dev --local --file migrations/seed/seed.sql
scripts.migrate:reset-local: rm -rf .wrangler/state/v3 && npm run migrate:local && npm run migrate:seed-local
scripts.migrate:dev: wrangler d1 migrations apply DB --env dev
scripts.migrate:production: wrangler d1 migrations apply DB --env production
